entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent warning code for array parameter passed to annotated location in ILLink/analyzer #96646
  • App using cached local storage sometimes after upgrading to .net8 #96644
  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator is suppressing IL2026 and IL3050 diagnostics even when it doesn't actually intercept the call #96643
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'next != nullptr' #96642
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests` - `aot-instances.dll with exit code 137` #96631
  • Hitting OOM in LLVM for the wasi-wasm aot smoke tests #96630
  • [wasm][post-MVP] shared everything threads #96629
    Future
  • ManagedDelay_ConfigureAwait_True test failure in CI #96628
    9.0.0
  • "Unexpected end of archive" while unzipping test assets #96627
  • Possibly incorrect nullable annotation on IndexExpression.Update() #96626
  • JIT: Improper zero-trip checking in loop cloning/unrolling #96623
    9.0.0
  • TrimmerRootAssembly results in incoherent trimming and hence integrity check error #96620
  • Native memory leak on TLS client reading OCSP staple. #96616
    7.0.x
  • JIT: `fgRemoveBlock` does not maintain edge weights #96614
  • on AOT with Intercepter, Reflection(GetValue) for Virtual Property of zero value causes crush. #96611
    9.0.0
  • Decimal validation against XSD #96610
  • Are only AMD64 and I386 hosts supported for the Linux cross-architecture component? #96608
  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/synchronized/synchronized.cmd #96600
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #96599
  • PGO: Multiple guesses for profiled casts #96598
    9.0.0
  • `HostResolverFactory.ResolveServiceProviderFactory` generates environment with incorrect `IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName` #96596

Closed

  • Use SearchValues<string> in Regex for single string searches #91644
    9.0.0
  • SerialPort is not supported on Mac Catalyst #75120
    Future
  • Is it possible to optimize Array.IndexOf(...) for Type? #95242
  • .NET 8, Windows x64 regression: Random (GC-related?) AVs in code constructing a large object graph from XML #94154
  • MarshalMode.ElementOut expects a ConvertToUnmanged function to exist #96564
    9.0.0
  • Unable to open https://source.dot.net/ because the certificate has expired. SEC_ERROR_EXPIRED_CERTIFICATE #96601
  • Vector128.LessThan broken for some UIntPtr values on mono #96443
  • Proposal: Add Support for Ad-hoc existential Types #12937
    Future
  • Discussion: ObjWriter in C# #77178
    9.0.0
  • AssemblyBuilderImpl.DefinePersistedAssembly has trouble with ReadOnlySpan methods #96469
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow specifying indent size and whitespace character when writing JSON with Utf8JsonWriter #63882
    9.0.0
  • Cast to nullable integer surprisingly fails on non-integers #96314
  • Test infra failure on iOS.Device.Aot.Test.WorkItemExecution CI leg #92792
    9.0.0
  • stackalloc is zeroed in prolog even if rarely-used #83629
    Future
  • Switches with intrinsic const aren't getting optimized #78356
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'OperIsSimple()' in pgo pipelines #96612
    9.0.0
  • Unable to run an MVC application using Docker Desktop #96355
  • [API Proposal]: JsonPolymorphic TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName Json Casing #96426
  • JsonSerializer constructor serialization does not ignore readonly properties #96408
  • .Net 6 API in failing at start up post this upgrade to VS2022 17.8. Getting error "Operation is not supported on this platform." #96507
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix last block removal during layout optimization #96649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use OriginalDefinition to get members of generic types #96648
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Create preheaders on new loops and delete old loop canonicalization #96647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add .NET 8 test project for System.Numerics.Tensors #96641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Gen0 segment should always be reported as Gen0 for DacHeapWalker #96640
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix fast-path support for ignoring nullable value types #96639
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix XUnitLogChecker detection for local test runs #96638
    area-Infrastructure
  • Short diff summary #96637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96634
    needs-area-label
  • Change IMarshallingGenerator resolution to use a sequential design instead of recursive #96632
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Adjust genRangeCheck for handling integer length stored in 6… #96621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify `BasicBlock::CloneBlockState` #96617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Invalidate old loop table immediately #96613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not limit InlineArrays on Native AOT #96607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix endian issue in AssemblySaveILGeneratorTests #96606
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution

Merged

  • PGO: Enable profiled casts by default #96597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove extraneous use of unchecked from System.Linq #96622
    area-System.Linq
  • add SerialStream support for MacCatalyst #96492
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Fix typo #95569
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • [browser] active issue 96628 #96635
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Replace LINQ's ArrayBuilder, LargeArrayBuilder, and SparseArrayBuilder with new SegmentedArrayBuilder #96570
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Allow specifying IndentCharacter and IndentSize when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96139
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Fix a few more paths to in-tree emsdk #96625
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][amd64] Fix Vector128 relational comparison API's for nuint type #96515
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Fix generic signature issue when calling non generic method of closed generic type #96517
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [mono][jit] Optimize the experimental-gshared-mrgctx code #96104
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update Enumerable.Min/Max for all IBinaryIntegers #96605
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Revamp empty special-casing in LINQ #96602
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Fix OperIsSimple assert in lower #96615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing in wrappers for valuetypes with an explicit l… #96230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Fix passing of valuetypes with a non-8 byte aligned size on arm64+ios/macos. #96079
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve performance of `Enumerable.ToDictionary()` #96574
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix AggregateBy with seed to use correct helper #96603
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Simplify methodtable #96466
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove checks on loop number in fgCanCompactBlocks #96479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add test for GetInterfaces() array type #96589
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • NativeAOT implement warning as errors as a compiler feature #96567
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add debug-only use of new AssemblyBuilder.Save in Regex.CompileToAssembly #96462
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add osx RPATH in corehost #96367
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable activation injection for unix #95555
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #95807
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #94582
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Avoid copy action for root assemblies #96363
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • STJ: set initial capacity of JsonObject if known (#96417) #96486
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #96388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #95990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Use pattern value in the summary for the generated regex method. #96488
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
